channel.title: ethics on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in ethics on FinanClub

item.title: Pause Time?
item.description: Can We Pause Time? The possibility of pausing time has long been a staple of science fiction. But is it really possible? And if so, what would the consequences be? In a recent article, [author name] argues that it is theoretically possible to pause time.

item.title: The Key to Making AI a Benefit, Not a Hazard
item.description: The Key to Making AI a Benefit, Not a Hazard Artificial intelligence (AI) is rapidly developing and has the potential to be a major benefit to society. However, there are also risks associated with AI, such as job displacement, bias, and misuse.
